mapper.select: SELECT CHECKDATE, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CHECKDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS CHECKDATE, EMPLYR_ID, CHECKIN, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CHECKIN, 'HH24MI'), 'HH24:MI') AS CHECKIN, CHECKOUT, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(CHECKOUT, 'HH24MI'), 'HH24:MI') AS CHECKOUT, INSTATE, OUTSTATE, OVER_CHECK_TIME, CHECK_TIME FROM ATTENDANCE WHERE #{id} ORDER BY CHECKDATE
